short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlights threads started by GabeD and PowerMizzou staff on the Tigers' Lair board, making important posts easy to spot.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Highlight PowerMizzou Staff is a Chrome extension designed to help users quickly identify important threads on the Tigers’ Lair message board on 247Sports. The extension highlights threads started by GabeD as well as the staff writers, making these threads easier to find and follow.

Key Features:

	•	Highlights Expert Threads: Automatically applies a unique style to threads started by GabeD or other users with the “Expert” badge, making them visually distinct and easy to locate on the Tigers’ Lair board.
	•	Focus on a Single Board: Specifically works on the Tigers’ Lair message board within the Missouri section of 247Sports, ensuring the extension only applies where it’s needed.
	•	Simple and Secure Permissions: Uses minimal permissions (activeTab and a specific host pattern) to provide this functionality while ensuring privacy and security.

Benefits:

This extension saves time for users by allowing them to quickly locate threads from official contributors and experts, enhancing their browsing experience on the Tigers’ Lair board.
